ovdesc.p: Allows the user to group together various T24 Applications.
Enables the creation of logical groups, which can be specified under user roles [EB.USER.ROLES], to avoid repetition of related applications in different user profiles.

desc.p: Specifies the functions, which are used to access the records of the Application, entered in the corresponding Field 2.
This field is used, together with the associated Fields 2.1 - 3.1 and 5.1 - 8.1 to specify precisely, which function, the user uses to access, which record and application.
Valid Function codes are: A 2 C D E H I L P Q R S V
(A=Authorise, 2=2nd Authoriser, C=copy, D=Delete, E=Exception, H=History restore, I=Input, L=List, P=Print, Q=Auditor review, R=Reverse, S=See, V=Verify)
If NOT is entered, plus one or more Function codes, the System converts the code to a list of all the Functions that are allowed.
Note:During an input function, even if the function C (copy) is not allowed, the user will still be able to transfer the ID (together with its enrichment) of a selected record using the ! facility.

desc.p: Specifies which Application is used in the group.
This field is used, together with the associated Fields 3.1 to 8.1, to specify precisely, which record in which Application, can be accessed by the User, using which Version and Function.

It must be the name of an existing Application, the name of an existing USER.SMS.GROUP preceded by the '@' sign, ALL.PG to allow access to all Applications or ALL.PG (program type) to allow access to all Applications of a certain type (see below).
The following program types can be used in conjunction with ALL.PG (e.g. ALL.PG.H) to give access to a particular type of program:-

p.p: H Program - 3 standard files exist - Live, Unauthorised and History, e.g. CUSTOMER.
U Program - Live and Unauthorised files exist, but no History, e.g. VERSION.
L Program - only a Live file exists (updated automatically by the system) e.g. STMT.ENTRY (only L, S and P functions can be used with this type of program).
M Program - designed to do other than processing the standard T24 functions using a specific file e.g. PASSWORD.ENABLE, End Of Day Batch programs.
T Program - handles automatically updated CONCAT files, e.g. CUSTOMER.ACCOUNT (only L, S and P functions can be used with this type of program).

desc.p: Note: The following 3 type M programs are available to all users and cannot be restricted:- SIGN.ON SIGN.OFF PASSWORD
